ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Pets vs. Familiars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe they are imps. Because it looks like my sister s Imp form. My sister went afk for a min and my brother sat at her comp and wandered around in imp
ygData.messageBody:
> See that's cool, I can see where he would be some fun. I was thinking
> originally that there was some function like a pet. I've seen some of
> the familiars that wiz's have and they are really cool. By "Flappy" I'm
> guessing that you have one of those little winged demon looking things?
> Those are just so cool!
>
I believe they are imps. Because it looks like my sister's Imp form. My
sister went afk for a min and my brother sat at her comp and wandered around
in imp form yelling "IMPudence" and stuff like that. He really loves imp
form. :-)
I think the mini-dragon or I guess drake form familiars are neat. I still
think it would be cool if there is a Planes of Power familiar spell that
lets you have a crystalline gargoyle familiar.
luv,
-Su
